info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:50PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Litchfield County through 515 PM EDT... At 450 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Preston, or 8 miles northeast of New Milford, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Torrington, Litchfield, Northwest Harwinton, New Preston, Cornwall Bridge, Harwinton, Bethlehem, Washington, Goshen, Morris, Warren, Cornwall, Bantam, West Torrington, Torringford, Hotchkissville, Haight Vineyard, Kelly Corner, West Goshen and Wrightville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
